Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer . Groups and singers as young as 12 years can audition for the series, which will premiere in the fall. Unlike "American Idol," "The X Factor" does not have an upper age limit. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell , the former "American Idol" who will be a judge and an executive producer on "The X Factor." "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent."

for New York's junior senator, Kirsten Gillibrand , since her friend Rep. Gabrielle Giffords was gunned down in Arizona. But one thing that hasn't changed for the Democrat is that she feels comfortable in her state. I'm not worried about my safety, and I feel very safe everywhere in our state, and I feel safe doing my job, Kirsten Gillibrand said after visiting Gabrielle Giffords yesterday and seeing the remarkable strides she's made since a lunatic turned a mundane supermarket meet-and-greet into a scene of horror. Chrysler emerged from bankruptcy in June 2009 and is now under the management control of Italy's Fiat SpA, which has a 25 percent stake in the U.S. automaker. Sergio Marchionne is also CEO of Fiat. As the only parties willing to underwrite the risk associated with Chrysler's recovery plan, the two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, Sergio Marchionne said.
